pages.text: 15|1|alif, laam, ra. vo is puskat tatha khule quraan kee aayaten hain.
15|2|(ek samay aayega) jab kaafir ye kaamana karenge ki kya hee achchha hota, yadi ve musalaaman[1] hote
15|3|(he nabee!)aap unhen chhod den, ve khaate tatha aanand lete rahen aur unhen aasha nishchet kiye rahe, phir sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge[1].
15|4|aur hamane jis bastee ko bhee dhvast kiya, usake lie ek nishchit avadhi ant thee.
15|5|koee jaati na apanee nishchit avadhi se aage ja sakatee hai aur na peechhe rah sakatee hai.
15|6|tatha un (kaafiron) ne kahaah he vah vyakti jisapar ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree gayee hai! vaastav mein, too paagal hai.
15|7|kyon hamaare paas farishton ko nahin laata, yadi too sachon mein se hai
15|8|jabaki ham farishton ko saty nirnay ke saath hee[1] utaarate hain aur unhen us samay koee avasar nahin diya jaata.
15|9|vaastav mein, hamane hee ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree hai aur ham hee isake rakshak[1] hain.
15|10|aur hamane aapase pahale bhee praacheen (vigat) jaatiyon mein rasool bheje.
15|11|aur unake paas jo bhee rasool aaya, ve usake saath parihaas karate rahe.
15|12|isee prakaar, ham ise[1] aparaadhiyon ke dilon mein piro dete hain.
15|13|ve usapar eemaan nahin laate aur pratham jaatiyon se yahee reeti chalee aa rahee hai.
15|14|aur yadi ham unapar aakaash ka koee dvaar khol dete, phir ve usamen chadhane lagate.
15|15|tababhee ve yahee kahate ki hamaaree aankhen dhokha kha rahee hain, balki hamapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai.
